DOC.brief_summary: A number study show short duration , high intensity interval train improve health-related outcome , insulin sensitivity cardiorespiratory fitness . However , often use specialized equipment , cycle ergometer , make difficult roll intervention wide-scale use general population . This study aim evaluate effect high intensity shuttle run intervention insulin sensitivity , fitness relate cardiometabolic risk factor men currently inactive . Participants randomize intervention ( 4 week shuttle run ) control group . We hypothesize shuttle run programme result improve insulin sensitivity , fitness increase fat oxidation rest compare control group .
DOC.brief_title: Effect 4 Weeks Shuttle Run Training Insulin Sensitivity Sedentary Men
DOC.criteria: male 1840 year undertake < 1 hour per week plan exercise BMI > 35 kg/m2 Blood pressure > 160/90 mm Hg ( antihypertensive medication ) history establish coronary heart disease family history early cardiac death ( < 40 year )
